Why Choose HealthLInk as Your Social Network for Health?

Increase commitment to health and wellness goals

HealthLink is an online community that believes that the biggest investment individuals can make is in their personal health and in the health of the ones they love, thus improving the quality as well as quantity of life. By connecting and collaborating with family and loved ones a more intensive health and wellness environment is created with accountability being maintained for progression towards wellness goals.

Connect with peoples

Social networks have emerged as a powerful catalyst for fostering connections in the realm of health and wellness. In an increasingly digital world, these platforms have revolutionized the way we access information, share experiences, and support one another on our wellness journeys.One of the most significant advantages of social networks in the health and wellness sphere is the ability to find and connect with individuals who share similar health goals and challenges.

Calculate BMI index , Calorie Burned , Amount of water intake

Calculating your Body Mass Index (BMI) is a straightforward method to assess your body's weight relative to your height.the calories burned during physical activity is essential for those aiming to maintain a healthy weight or lose excess pounds.Lastly, staying adequately hydrated is vital for overall well-being.

Create your health profile

Review your wellness summary in a simple and organized view and enter tracking data for Height, Weight, Systolic blood pressure, Diastolic blood pressure and Blood glucose level for a full profile.

Monitor Exercise and Diet

Keep an exercise and diet log to calculate how many calories you’ve burned and your caloric intake.

Keep loved ones close

Tracking members' health parameters to improve communication, and provide a peace of mind and a means for family and loved ones to actively participate in health improvement strategies.

Chat with partners

By connecting and collaborating with family and loved ones a more intensive environment is created with accountability being maintained for progression towards wellness goals.
